name: Luvdisc
author: Motofumi Fujiwara
flavor_text: It lives in warm seas. It is said that a couple finding this Pokémon will be blessed with eternal love.

attacks.name: Rendezvous
attacks.effect: Reveal the top card of your deck and put it into your hand. If that card is a Pokémon, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Synchro Dance
attacks.effect: If Luvdisc and the Defending Pokémon have the same amount of Energy attached to them, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.
